articles.author: Myles Simmons
articles.title: Jason Licht: Teddy Bridgewater was next option if Tom Brady hadn’t signed in 2020 - NBC Sports
articles.description: Teddy Bridgewater technically hasn't signed with the Buccaneers yet — though he's on his way to doing so.
articles.content:
Teddy Bridgewater technically hasnt signed with the Buccaneers yet though hes on his way to doing so.
